::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod was still searching for Kamodia, when he drove in to the jungle.
He couldn't drive through the tress.
"Hot Rod, maximize." He transformed, and started searching on foot.
He came across a bot.(Who is actually Kamodia.)
"Hello there, I'm Hot Rod. Do you know a bot named Kamodia?" He asked.
